summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Legenddary eBook platform. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate), but frontend authentication integration has critical issues preventing user registration and login.

integration_issues.issue: Registration form submission returns 400 error from backend API
Login form submission returns 401 error from backend API
All protected routes redirect to login page due to authentication failure

passed_tests: Landing page loads with correct gold/yellow branding
Navigation elements are present and functional
Feature cards display correctly (8 cards found)
All backend API endpoints (41/41 tests passed)
User registration API works via direct testing
User login API works via direct testing
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix frontend-backend authentication integration. The backend APIs work perfectly when tested directly, but the frontend cannot successfully authenticate users. This appears to be a CORS issue, axios configuration problem, or request format mismatch. All user flows are blocked until authentication is fixed.
